meanings.definition: A painful burning sensation in the chest, caused by acid reflux.
meanings.sent1: After eating spicy food, she felt intense heartburns in her chest.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication to relieve his chronic heartburns.
meanings.sent3: Despite his love for hot sauce, he always regretted it later with heartburns.
meanings.sent4: The fiery sensation of heartburns was like a dragon breathing fire in his chest.
meanings.sent5: The heartburns were so severe, it felt like a volcano erupting inside him.

meanings.sent1: She heartburns every time she has to speak in public.
meanings.sent2: He heartburns whenever he thinks about his upcoming exams.
meanings.sent3: The cat heartburns when it's time to take a bath.
meanings.sent4: The old car heartburns and sputters when trying to start on cold mornings.
meanings.sent5: The child heartburns at the thought of going to the dentist.
